items.name: PALE PALE PALE 12-PACK
items.desc:
PALE PALE PALE 12 x 440ml Pack
A new pack of pure pale ale perfection for all your hoppy needs. Cases cannot be customised. Beers included:
4 x A BETTER PARTY – DDH PALE ALE (SIMCOE CASCADE AMARILLO) – 4.8% ABV *NEW*
Forget about the ups and downs, forget the *cough* typos, forget about this stupid year. We’re going somewhere better! Simcoe, Cascade and Amarillo give this DDH Pale some punchy grapefruit and orange flavours with a soft, pithy finish.
4 x DOG EARED VOWS – DDH PALE ALE (ELLA VIC SECRET CITRA) – 5.2% ABV
Sometimes you just can’t help coming back to your favourites. A combo of absolute worldies – Ella, Vic Secret and Citra – generate superfruit particles and juicy reactions throughout this gluggable slice of tropical sunshine.
4 x SECRET HOTEL – DDH RYE PALE ALE (CRYO CITRA ENIGMA SABRO) – 5.5% ABV
Secret Hotel is a DDH Rye Pale Ale hopped with Cryo Citra, Enigma and Sabro. Super-pale, hazy and complex, with notes of berries, pineapple and coconut from the hops mingling with a sweet, bready note of spice from the rye malt.

items.name: Rainbow Healing Temple
items.desc:
Rainbow Healing Temple / Export Porter / 4 x 440ml / 6.8% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
RAINBOW HEALING TEMPLE is a new 6.8% Export Porter designed to give you classic, hefty malt flavours balanced by some poppin‘ dry hop.
It’s a stocky, sturdy dark beer full of chocolate, raisin and toasty vibes, while lightly tropical and resinous hop notes give it a firm, fresh finish. Full-bodied flavours matched by massive drinkability. Whammo.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Rooftops
items.desc:
Rooftops / New England TIPA / 1 x 440ml / 9.5% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Rooftops is our first ever canned TIPA, hopped with Chinook, Citra and Sabro! It’s scandalously juicy with ripe mango, pineapple, and zesty lime, while a tickle of coconut gives this beer a silky drinkability for such a giant lad.
One can leaves 23 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Search & Rescue
items.desc:
Search & Rescue / DIPA / 1 x 440ml / 8.3% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
A mountain of smooth, bright, pale malt is capped with majestic Citra, Azacca and Idaho 7 for our final DIPA of 2020. Hi-visibility yellow for safety. Brimming with vibrant mango, tangerine and pineapple flavours you could find in an avalanche.
One can leaves 23 can slots left in your case!

items.name: Stereo Belly
items.desc:
Stereo Belly / NEIPA / 4 x 440ml / 7.1% ABV
Suitable for vegans.
Citra and Sabro lead this tropical fruit cruise across the planet New England, with the magic fairy dust that it is Zythos giving everything a rose-tinted, peachy vibe. These hops create echoes in stereo.
One 4-pack leaves 20 can slots left in your case!
